description:
Serving clients throughout the eastern side of Greenville, South Carolina, from the office at 128 Millport Circle, the legal professionals at the Law Office of David L Hood deliver the personalized attention and aggressive representation you need to increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you deserve for the injuries and losses that you have suffered as the result of someone else's negligence.

Along with handling all types of catastrophic personal injury and wrongful death claims, the law firm's attorneys can also assist you with obtaining your Social Security Disability benefits if you have a debilitating condition that prevents you from working. Established in 1991, the firm has a long and rich history of serving individuals and families during their most dire times of need, and it has recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for its plaintiff clients.

Regarded as one of the leading trial lawyers in the country, David L. Hood is Notable peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell and has earned the organization's Gold Client Champion award, as well. In addition, he has received numerous testimonials and referrals from his satisfied clients for his outstanding professionalism and unwavering dedication to helping his clients achieve justice in the wake of a preventable tragedy.

With two locations in Greenville and 12 total offices across the state, the law firm provides convenient access to unmatched advocacy and support to South Carolinians who have been adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, defective products, mesothelioma and more. If you would like to discuss your situation at no cost, you can contact the Law Office of David L Hood to schedule an appointment. It also offers virtual consultations so that you do not have to further risk the safety and health of yourself and your family.

*AV速, AV Preeminent速, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell速 is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell速 Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
